title: Fixing supports sightstone problems
body:
Hi guys,
I just had an idea I'm not the most mechanically skilled person but I do pride myself on being strategically inclined in league and I happen to main support (even though it's because fill is auto support). Anyway I read some stuff watched some stuff and rito seems to wanna improve support and a great idea came up about what to do with sightstone. Should it be an automatic buy? I do believe it should be however I believe it should be viable in other lanes and have an idea as to how. In support I actually enjoy the ordeal of vision control and knowing what's happening and that I was the the reason we could steal baron or dragon or see lee coming in for a gank. The same way a support feels great for peeling and making that clutch save. The subject of sightstone is trading utility and a little health  for a "laners" item or an item that compliments your character or playstyle. I feel that the idea riot had for the gold income with sightstone was a great idea however they just added utility to more utility and a nudge towards scaling. Why don't they make a variant of sightstone but with scaling for supports? (Obviously with not as much scaling as another item for the final version) Think of the jungle enchantments but on a sightstone. I'm not certain as to ratios or numbers but as a general idea they could be something like:
 sightstone+null mantle+cloth+??= emerald sightstone gives ?? Armor ?? MR give ???? Health (more then 800) 
Sapphire sightstone=sightstone+ some ap item gives ???? Health ?? Ap ?? Other (CDR move speed something)
Ruby sightstone= sightstone+ad+?? Gives ???? Health ?? Ad ?? (Lethality attack speed or other etc.)
Not only would this offer scaling paths for sightstone it would encourage others to take sightstone in lane so it isn't only the supports "job" to ward but as a trade off laners would have less stats then they would an item of the same cost of the appropriate correspondance. Would love your guys feedback on this.

replies.body: This is why the hybrid sightstone items exist already.

Yes but as i stated the hybrid items take away the best part of your support item the actives and it combines a form of utility with another form of utility to offer extremely little to no scaling as i stated. However these new items would be on par with the finalized support income items but as a sightstone enhancement. That way the support items both income and sightstone can scale in favor of your champ or playstyle rather then put your two support items into a very inefficient item that simply frees up a spot.

The ruby sightstone is already viable elsewhere. It's 1600gp for 500hp and sight control.

It's just that everyone is playing assassins right now so nothing but dmg gets built.

Yes i realize it is viable elsewhere i simply meant that it would help it leave those niche situations as well as bot lane. I mean akali and kat in the past have built it and they typically have very little to no health items. I just thought it would make other laners take a look twice if they aren't say akali lee sin kat or those you do see build it for their kits purpose. Maybe top laners will start to pick up the tank version to help with tops vision control while only sacrificing a little more  then the sunfire or zzrot or whatever they were building. I know I'd certainly build it on mid TF if there was an ap version because i almost always had wards on both sides in season 5 and 6
